resources.string: Welcome to MacAddroid. Your friendly MAC address changer.
I can perform a few actions for you:
Change the MAC address to one you provide
Change the MAC address to one selected at random
In the future I want to be able to:
Be able to change the MAC address whenever you connect to a new Wireless network
Change the MAC address so it appears to be made by a specific manufacturer
Compare the current MAC address and the proposed new MAC address."
I don\'t like this one. Create another MAC Address
